description: Carries additional confidentiality codes beyond the base fixed code specified in the CDA document.

element.comment: Typically, this is used where an institution has their own set of confidentiality codes that have different granularity that the base CDA codes, or for legacy reasons. For security-related codes other than confidentiality, see [[security-labels-html]].
element.definition: Carries additional confidentiality codes beyond the base fixed code specified in the CDA document.

element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.
